original_title: Bon Jovi - Rock in Rio Madrid 2010
overview: Excellent quality Proshot broadcast recording of Bon Jovi, live at the Rock in Rio Festival, in Madrid, Spain, on June 4th, 2010. Total running time is 121 minutes. Quality is 9/10, and track listing is as follows:  1. Blood on Blood (*)  2. We Weren't Born to Follow  3. You Give Love a Bad Name  4. Born to Be My Baby  5. Lost Highway  6. In These Arms  7. Have a Nice Day  8. When We Were Beautiful  9. Superman Tonight  10. Captain Crash & the Beauty Queen From Mars  11. Bad Medicine / Roadhouse Blues / Shout  12. It's My Life  13. Someday I'll Be Saturday Night  14. Hallelujah (Leonard Cohen cover)  15. I'll Sleep When I'm Dead  16. Runaway  17. Work for the Working Man  18. Who Says You Can't Go Home  19. Keep the Faith  20. Wanted Dead or Alive  21. Livin' on a Prayer
title: Bon Jovi - Rock in Rio Madrid 2010
